HTTP to HTTPS redirect.description:
Access the Rockstor Admin Web UI without having to remember to type https://.

Based on a custom docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/geldim/https-redirect, available for amd64 architecture only.

80.description: Set this to port 80 to accept HTTP connections. It will automatically redirect to HTTPS, where the admin UI is hosted (port 443)
80.label: HTTP port
